description.value:
Gain the Survival Skill (or increase it by one level) or Dark Soul Talent. Whenever you spend a Fate Point to recover wounds, you can reroll the dice but must accept the second result.
Reduce starting Fate Points by 1, suffer -5 on Fellowship Tests when interacting with Void Born, ORgue Traders, or Voidfarers that are not Personal Friends if they have heard of your background and reputation.

system.effectText:
Gain the Survival Skill (or increase it by one level) or Dark Soul Talent. Whenever you spend a Fate Point to recover wounds, you can reroll the dice but must accept the second result.
Reduce starting Fate Points by 1, suffer -5 on Fellowship Tests when interacting with Void Born, ORgue Traders, or Voidfarers that are not Personal Friends if they have heard of your background and reputation.
